thread.title: Jitterbit Hires New Sales and EMEA Executives to Keep Pace With Surging Demand

author: cnbc.com
title: Jitterbit Hires New Sales and EMEA Executives to Keep Pace With Surging Demand
text:
ALAMEDA, Calif., Feb. 08, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Jitterbit, the API transformation company , today announced that it has added a new Vice President of EMEA and a new Vice President of Sales, North America, as it continues to expand its global footprint. Henk Adriaans, the new VP of EMEA (Europe, Middle East, and Africa), will lead all activities across all disciplines in the EMEA region, and Michael Muhlfelder, the new VP of Sales, North America, will lead the team that sells Jitterbit’s enterprise integration-platform-as-a-service (eiPaaS) to both new and existing customers.
Adriaans joins Jitterbit following a five-year term at the data integration provider Scribe Software, where he built out the EMEA territory. Adriaans will leverage his deep knowledge of the integration technology market and decades of sales experience to meet surging demand for the Jitterbit integration platform. He will lead Jitterbit’s growing EMEA arm from the company’s Netherlands office.
“The demand for Jitterbit’s API and integration solutions in EMEA is enormous, and I look forward to scaling up the territory to help the growing number of enterprises wanting to accelerate their digital transformation,” Adriaans said.
Muhlfelder, Jitterbit’s new Vice President of Sales, North America, previously served as the Chief Revenue Officer for MapAnything, a Salesforce Gold Partner specializing in geo-location and telematics solutions. Muhlfelder has over 25 years of business-to-business selling and sales leadership experience across all verticals and company sizes, bringing expertise in CRM, collaboration and the Internet of Things (IoT). He has also built and managed sales teams at LogMeIn, Cast Iron Systems (acquired by IBM), ADP Siebel, PeopleSoft and Oracle.
“Jitterbit is blazing the trail in a rapidly expanding market, as companies increasingly move to the cloud,” Muhlfelder said. “As a leader in hybrid integration and APIs, Jitterbit sits at the intersection of many important trends and technologies, and I look forward to working with countless new and existing customers as we rapidly scale the business.”
About Jitterbit, Inc.
Jitterbit, the API transformation company, makes it quicker and easier for businesses to exploit data from any source, empowering them to rapidly innovate and make faster, more effective decisions. The Jitterbit API integration platform enables companies to quickly connect SaaS, on-premises, and cloud applications and instantly infuse intelligence into any business process.
